title.narrative: Improving the livelihood and income of the most vulnerable conflict affected people in Teso, North East Uganda

description.narrative: To reduce poverty and hunger of vulnerable returnees from IDP camps in Teso sub-region through the distribution of agricultural/livestock inputs and delivery of training on appropriate and environmentally sustainable technology. Livelihood security will be increased through training on income diversification and provision of seed capital for start up businesses.;

War on Want NI\\\'s contribution to the project transferred during Q2 July-Sept 2014. Planned partner activities included the procurement of livestock between Jul-Sep 2014. Foot and Mouth outbreak prevented this happening in the quarter.
